appDescription: Your AI-powered guide to understanding symptoms of water-borne diseases and finding help near you.
symptomCheckerDescription: Describe your symptoms and get instant AI-powered insights into possible conditions related to water contamination.
nearbyClinicsDescription: Use your location to find the nearest clinics and hospitals for professional medical assistance.
medicalNewsDescription: Stay informed with the latest articles and updates on water-borne diseases and public health.
settingsDescription: Manage your theme and language preferences.
